participant_1.name: Clara Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Clara tends to find joy in quiet activities and has a deep compassion for animals.
participant_1.background: i spend my time bird watching with my cats. i'm an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say.

participant_2.name: Henry Thompson
participant_2.personality: Curious and knowledgeable, Henry enjoys sharing his passion for history and art while being a bit quirky due to his hearing impairment.
participant_2.background: i've a big library at home. i am partly deaf. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.
